topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 1.1 Carrier Grade: API Reference

body.p: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade is built on OpenStack technologies.
The OpenStack REST API Documentation is open-source; both the published formats (PDF and HTML pages) as well as the docbook/wadl source documents. The published formats can be found at .

The open-source OpenStack REST API Documentation is currently NOT versioned. There is only a master/current version of the OpenStack REST API Documentation containing updates from 'all' versions of OpenStack.
For the API refernece for the non-KVM region, see

For the API refernece for the KVM region, see Hp Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade: REST API Guide. This document contains HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade extensions to the OpenStack Compute API for use with the servers in the KVM region.
For the KVM and ESX deployments, you can use aspects of the VMware vSphere API, as applicable for your license agreement. Refer to the vSphere documentation for more information.
For the KVM and ESX deployments, you can use aspects of the HP Distributed Cloud Networking (DCN) API, as applicable for your license agreement. Refer to the DCN documentation for more information.

p.b: HP Helion OpenStack CArrier Grade Software Development Kit (SDK)

body.p: The HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade SDK can be used by guest applications to interact programmatically with HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade. See the Software Development Kit guide.
